attributes.action: Leave office due to a vote of no confidence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Massive overspending in the good times has now led to the UK being a bankrupt country. Now today (11/9/8) you have announced a fuel bill which will save low income families money with the offer of insulation and more energy saving gimmicks, which amount to vote grabbing from a dead man walking.
Do you not realise that the tax payer will pay for this as the energy cartels will ahve to increase pricing due to you asking them for 'assistance'.
The UK tax payer has had enough of years of Labour inepitude.

Enough is enough. More and more people want to quit this CCTV'd, over taxed hell hole and more and more are going to benefits as it pays more.

Resign now and call an election.
